item.title: 中国船只在马尔代夫用于科学研究-外交部
item.description: Research being carried out by a Chinese vessel calling at a port in the Maldives is exclusively for peaceful purposes and enhancing scientific understanding, the Chinese foreign ministry said on Tuesday as the research vessel is set to arrive in the island nation.翻译:中国外交部周二表示，一艘中国船只停靠马尔代夫港口进行的研究完全出于和平目的并增进科学认识，该船即将抵达这个岛国。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 脱北者称口粮减少和市场依赖为由
item.description: The majority of North Koreans who resettled in South Korea over the last decade said they never received government rations in the isolated state and had to rely on an informal market to survive, a study issued by Seoul's unification ministry showed.翻译:首尔统一部发布的一项研究显示，过去十年在韩国重新定居的大多数朝鲜人表示，他们从未在这个孤立的国家获得过政府口粮，不得不依靠非正式市场生存。
item.author: Hyonhee Shin

item.title: 中国市场因政策提振前景而跃升
item.description: Chinese equities headed for their biggest gains in 14 months on Tuesday and the yuan rose on further signs of state support for markets and a news report that President Xi Jinping was set to discuss markets with financial regulators.翻译:周二，中国股市创下 14 个月以来的最大涨幅，人民币上涨，原因是国家支持市场的进一步迹象以及国家主席习近平将与金融监管机构讨论市场的新闻报道。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国监管机构出台更多卖空限制措施
item.description: China's securities regulator said on Tuesday it would suspend brokerages from borrowing shares for lending and cap the size of so-called securities refinancing, as part of further efforts to curb short-selling.翻译:中国证券监管机构周二表示，将暂停券商借入股票进行借贷，并限制所谓的证券再融资规模，作为进一步遏制卖空行为的一部分。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 欧盟旨在就实现绿色工业雄心的关键路径达成一致
item.description: European Union policymakers hope to agree new rules on Tuesday to promote domestic production of equipment for solar and wind power, fuel cells and other clean technologies to ensure its industry can compete with Chinese and U.S. competitors.翻译:欧盟政策制定者希望周二达成新规则，促进太阳能、风能、燃料电池和其他清洁技术设备的国内生产，以确保其行业能够与中国和美国竞争对手竞争。
item.author: Philip Blenkinsop

item.title: 梅西希望在香港队表现不佳后参加东京友谊赛
item.description: After disappointing a legion of fans in Hong Kong with a no-show on the pitch at the weekend, Lionel Messi left open the possibility of playing in Inter Miami's friendly in Tokyo, saying he left "much better" than he did a few days ago.翻译:周末缺席比赛，令众多香港球迷失望后，梅西保留了参加国际迈阿密在东京的友谊赛的可能性，并表示他离开时比几天前“好多了” 。
item.author: Chang-Ran Kim

item.title: 中国表示反对并打击一切形式的网络攻击
item.description: The Chinese government does not tolerate any form of cyberattacks and will not allow any country or individual to engage in such illegal activities using Chinese infrastructure, its embassy in the Philippines said.翻译:中国驻菲律宾大使馆表示，中国政府不会容忍任何形式的网络攻击，也不会允许任何国家和个人利用中国基础设施从事此类非法活动。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国股市因救援行动而飙升；美元，收益率稳定
item.description: Asian shares rode a sharp rise in Chinese stocks higher on Tuesday as Beijing ramped up efforts to put a floor under its slumping market, but elsewhere investors were cautious as bets trimmed for a near-term Federal Reserve rate cut.翻译:周二，亚洲股市随着中国股市的上涨而大幅上涨，因为北京方面加大力度为低迷的市场提供支撑，但其他地区的投资者则持谨慎态度，因为对美联储近期降息的押注减少。
item.author: Rae Wee

item.title: 独家：外交部长称台湾盟友危地马拉正在考虑与中国建立商业关系
item.description: Guatemala is considering reaching out to develop formal trade ties with China, the Central American country's foreign minister told Reuters on Monday, although it plans to maintain its existing relations with Taiwan.翻译:中美洲国家危地马拉外交部长周一告诉路透社，危地马拉正在考虑与中国建立正式贸易关系，但计划维持与台湾的现有关系。
item.author: Sofia Menchu

item.title: 雪、冰阻碍了数百万中国人春节前的回家之旅
item.description: Freezing rain, snow and ice have complicated the journey home for many in central and eastern China, as billions travel ahead of the Spring Festival in chilly weather.翻译:冻雨、雪和冰使中国中部和东部地区的许多人的回家之路变得复杂，数十亿人在春节前在寒冷的天气中出行。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 日本SMBC聘请前瑞士信贷中国区总裁斯托尔
item.description: Japan's Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corp (SMBC) said on Tuesday it has hired former Credit Suisse China boss Carsten Stoehr as its deputy head for the Asia Pacific region.翻译:日本三井住友银行（SMBC）周二表示，已聘请前瑞士信贷中国区总裁卡斯滕·斯托尔（Carsten Stoehr）担任亚太区副总裁。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美元波动，澳元因加息前景而上涨
item.description: The U.S. dollar wobbled near a three-month peak as expectations the Federal Reserve is unlikely to cut rates aggressively this year take hold, while the Australian dollar rose after the central bank said it could not rule out another rate hike.翻译:由于预期美联储今年不太可能大幅降息，美元在三个月高点附近波动，而在央行表示不排除再次加息后，澳元上涨。
item.author: Ankur Banerjee

item.title: 泰国相信援助努力将引发缅甸危机对话
item.description: A new Thailand-led humanitarian initiative aims to pave the way for talks between warring camps in military-ruled Myanmar, a senior Thai official said, three years after a coup triggered instability and a wave of violence across the country.翻译:泰国一名高级官员表示，泰国领导的一项新的人道主义倡议旨在为军事统治的缅甸交战阵营之间的谈判铺平道路，三年前，一场政变引发了全国各地的不稳定和暴力浪潮。
item.author: Panu Wongcha-Um

item.title: 总理称中国法院对澳大利亚作家缓刑的判决“令人愤慨”
item.description: Australia Prime Minister Anthony Albanese on Tuesday said it was an "outrage" that a Beijing court handed Australian writer Yang Hengjun a suspended death sentence on espionage charges.翻译:澳大利亚总理安东尼·艾博内斯周二表示，北京一家法院以间谍罪名判处澳大利亚作家杨恒均死刑缓期执行，这是一种“愤慨”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国财政部团队前往中国讨论补贴和经济政策
item.description: The Biden administration has sent five senior U.S. Treasury officials to Beijing this week for economic talks that will include China's "non-market" policies that are adding excess industrial capacity, a Treasury official said on Monday.翻译:一位财政部官员周一表示，拜登政府本周已派出五名美国财政部高级官员前往北京进行经济会谈，其中将包括中国增加过剩工业产能的“非市场”政策。
item.author: David Lawder

item.title: 工作忧虑让中国人回家度假心情不好
item.description: Chinese workers packed into trains on Monday, heading home for the Lunar New Year holidays with worries about their jobs and a stuttering economy overshadowing the build-up to the long-awaited family reunions.翻译:周一，中国工人们挤上火车回家过农历新年假期，他们对工作和经济不景气的担忧给人们期待已久的家庭团聚蒙上了阴影。
item.author: Nicoco Chan, Samuel Shen

item.title: 杨恒均：这句话对中澳关系意味着什么
item.description: The suspended death sentence handed to Australian writer Yang Hengjun in Beijing on Monday is unlikely to derail Australia-China ties but will test the limits of Canberra's push to put relations back on track after years of tensions, analysts say.翻译:分析人士表示，澳大利亚作家杨恒均周一在北京被判处死刑缓期执行，这不太可能破坏澳中关系，但将考验堪培拉在多年紧张关系后推动两国关系重回正轨的努力的极限。
item.author: Laurie Chen

item.title: 独家：随着股市暴跌，中国券商限制跨境互换--消息人士
item.description: Chinese brokerages, including state-owned behemoth China International Capital Corp (CICC), have restricted the amount of cross-border swap transactions domestic investors can undertake, as authorities seek to defend the weak stock market, according to six sources familiar with the matter.翻译:据六位知情人士透露，为了捍卫疲软的股市，包括国有巨头中国国际金融公司（中金公司）在内的中国券商限制了国内投资者可以进行的跨境掉期交易金额。
item.author: Summer Zhen

item.title: 美国法案对药明康德及其西方制药商合作伙伴构成风险
item.description: A draft U.S. bill that has triggered a sell-off in shares of China's biotech firm Wuxi Apptec could deal a major blow not just to the firm but could also impact many labs and Western drugmakers that rely on it for research and manufacturing, public data showed.翻译:公开数据显示，美国一项法案草案引发了中国生物技术公司药明康德股票的抛售，这不仅对该公司造成重大打击，还可能影响许多依赖该公司进行研究和制造的实验室和西方制药商。
item.author: Andrew Silver

item.title: 中国价格暴跌将一些出口商推向崩溃边缘
item.description: Prolonged factory deflation is threatening the survival of smaller Chinese exporters.翻译:长期的工厂通缩正在威胁中国小型出口商的生存。
item.author: Ellen Zhang, Marius Zaharia
